pkgmetadata.longdescription: # THIS IS A CLONE[Clone](https://github.com/alexberazouski/chevron) of [original chevron](https://github.com/noahmorrison/chevron) (all credits go there).Clone was created for a single purpose of releasing a package with the latest merged changes in the original repo.And to let other people know how to install it.## UsageSee the [original repo](https://github.com/noahmorrison/chevron)
